snippet: The chief federal judge in Montana has apologized for forwarding to some of his friends an e-mail with a racist joke about President Obama.
abstract: Chief Federal Judge Richard F Cebull apologizes for forwarding an e-mail containing a racist joke about Pres Obama, submitting a complaint of judicial misconduct about his own actions.
lead_paragraph: The chief federal judge in Montana has apologized for forwarding to some of his friends an e-mail with a racist joke about President Obama.

headline.main: Montana: Judge Sends Racist Joke About Obama
headline.print_headline: Montana: Judge Sends Racist Joke About Obama
